channel.title: St Luke's, Wimbledon Park. Sunday services : 1030 & 6pm. Do join us.
channel.description: St Luke's, Wimbledon Park. Sunday services : 1030 & 6pm. Do join us.

item.title: No title
item.description: Welcome to our blog. Here we post articles and videos of interest, for church members.  We hope that you will enjoy them, and share and discuss them with other church members and friends.  Scroll down to read them: the newest articles will be at the top.  Let us know your thoughts and questions on them.

item.title: Sermon on 'The EU referendum : what would Jesus do?' by Andy O'Brien
Missionary died thinking he was a failure; 84 years later thriving churches found hidden in the jungle | God Reports
item.description:
Missionary died thinking he was a failure; 84 years later thriving churches found hidden in the jungle | God Reports

By Mark Ellis In 1912, medical missionary Dr. William Leslie went to live and minister to tribal people in a remote corner of the Democratic Republic of the Congo. After 17 years he returned to the U.S. a discouraged man - believing he failed to make an impact for Christ.

item.title: When You Can't Stop Feeling Ashamed - Walking the Shoreline
item.description:
When You Can't Stop Feeling Ashamed - Walking the Shoreline

That hanging sense of guilt and shame, a wondering if you'll ever be good enough... What do you do when you can't stop feeling ashamed? When it comes to secrets, most of us have quite a few. We can have secrets about what we want to do with our lives.

item.title: After 12 Years Of Quarterly Church Attendance, Parents Shocked By Daughter's Lack Of Faith | The Babylon Bee
item.description:
After 12 Years Of Quarterly Church Attendance, Parents Shocked By Daughter's Lack Of Faith | The Babylon Bee

Fullerton, CA-Local father Trevor Michelson, 48, and his wife Kerri, 45, are reeling after discovering that after 12 years of steadily taking their daughter Janie to church every Sunday they didn't have a more pressing sporting commitment-which was at least once every three months-she no longer demonstrates the strong quarterly commitment to the faith they raised her

item.title: Your Church Needs You! - An interview with Rico Tice | The Good Book Blog
item.description:
Your Church Needs You! - An interview with Rico Tice | The Good Book Blog

Rico Tice is Senior Minister (Evangelism) at All Souls Church, Langham Place in London. Born in Chile before being educated in England, Rico spent a year working at a church in inner city Liverpool and then studied history at Bristol University (where he was captain of the rugby team).

item.title: The Darkness of Porn and the Hope of the Gospel
item.description:
The Darkness of Porn and the Hope of the Gospel

TIME magazine has published one of the saddest, most horrifying cover stories I have ever read. It is not horrifying like the carnage of war. It's horrifying like the carnage of a culture that is committing slow-motion suicide. The essay documents a civilization-wide calamity on a scale that we have not seen before.

item.title: Thy Kingdom Come | Pete Greig on Praying for 5 Friends
item.description:
Thy Kingdom Come | Pete Greig on Praying for 5 Friends

Pete Greig from 24-7 Prayer tells the story of the great preacher DL Moody who prayed for 100 of his friends who didn't yet know Jesus - and the extraordinary result that had. It's an encouragement for us all to pray for our friends who we'd love to know the good news of Jesus.

item.title: How to answer difficult questions with help from Captain Kirk | The Good Book Blog
item.description:
How to answer difficult questions with help from Captain Kirk | The Good Book Blog

For many people these are slam-dunk arguments that enable them to dismiss the Bible, the God of the Bible and the Christian faith without further thought. Memes on these and many other subjects pervade the internet-and people are only too happy to throw them around-and sometimes, in your face.

item.title: The Book of Leviticus Overview
item.description:
The Book of Leviticus Overview

An animated Bible walk through of Leviticus Want to see more? Our Website: http://www.jointhebibleproject.com Say hello or follow us here: Twitter: http://twitter.com/joinbibleproj Facebook: http://fb.com/jointhebibleproject Leviticus is difficult to read, but its core message is amazing: God graciously provides a way for sinful, broken people to live near his holy presence so they can find wholeness and life.
